projects.title: CBEngine
projects.description: CBEngine is a custom C++17/OpenGL 3D engine featuring ECS, PBR rendering, and a mesh-to-voxel workflow for destructible voxel games.

projects.title: Killwats League
projects.description: Fast-paced 1v1 sports game with dynamic cameras and arcade ball physics

projects.title: The Last Branch
projects.description: The Last Branch is a beautiful adventure game, where you play as a child of the Godtree, the last hope for life. Explore an ancient abandoned temple, and meet the many lost spirits, lingering in its halls. Repel the infestation of Rot and escape from the temple to restore life to the world!

projects.title: The Price of Sanity
projects.description: Daggerblade: The Price of Sanity is a top-down isometric, Lovecraftian strategy game inspired by Plants vs Zombies and Slay the Spire. Wield a cursed blade that grants power while drawing horrors to you, explore the Sanguine Isles, and survive tile-based combat encounters by using spells and structures to defeat advancing enemies. As the world twists around an extra-dimensional wound, you must confront the consequences of unleashing an ancient calamity and attempt to seal it once again.
